Summary: A dozen or more blimp/cylinder objects hanging in the sky.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Orrville
There were no other sightings in Orrville on or around October 20th 1959
divs: sighting detailsthis siteing was in the fall of 1959, on a clear sunny day in the fall. i was six years old at the time and lived in a house on paradise road near the south western part of orrville,ohio. i was playing in the living room and decided to go to my bedroom for more toys. once i got to the bedroom i felt compelled to look out the window, which faced the east. i couldn't believe what i saw,there were a dozen or more cylinder\blimp type objects in the south eastern sky. they looked to be just hanging there in the sky just as if they were painted without movement. i would estimate that they were all the size of a hotdog twenty feet away. i could see them clearly as our home was one of four on the street and a huge freshly cut corn field was behind our home. they were just above a black railroad tressel which was between one half to three quarter of a mile away. i ran to the kitchen to get my mom in here to see them. i tugged at my mothers arm and said there are blimps or balloons are in the sky, you gotta come see. she said your "imagineing things go play"! i looked at her and could see the wall clock was just before the three o'clock hour,i said come and look,and she came to my room and i said look,and she said where,i said right there as i looked out the window to the empty sky. she said,"go play" now i never had much of a person to make up things and here i am in a position where it looks as if i'm creating a fib. i did go onto play with my toys afterward,but i still hate the thought that i may have been the only one to see this site.
